name: Glasya
description: Glasya, Queen of Vanity, Duke of the 6th Layer of Hell, Daughter of Asmodeous, was put in power by her father after he became angry with the previous ruler of Malibolge.  Her loyalty to her father is only matched by the blackness of her heart, she delights in torture and mutilation.  She is considered the most beautiful of the Dukes of Hell.
